channel.title: Looking for 2010-2012 AND Castle Wars
channel.description:
I've been searching for a while but not having much luck!
Looking for a server with Castle Wars and no older than 2010. I just want one to mess around on and do some coding myself. Would be nice if it had dungeoneering, turmoil, and some bosses as well.
Thanks for your help guys.

item.title: Looking for 2010-2012 AND Castle Wars
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

tyb97:

Learn Java and program your own version of Castle Wars. I don’t think anybody has released a moderately-complete Castle Wars snippet though. I know I wouldn’t if I were them.

OR be like rand or me, learning from rsps. I highly suggest not to do this. Look at me and you’ll know why…

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for 2010-2012 AND Castle Wars
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Tip, read this.
http://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/reallybigindex.html

Another tip, don’t use higher revision servers if you are just starting out.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for 2010-2012 AND Castle Wars
item.dc:creator: @A_Gh0st A Gh0st
item.description:
@A_Gh0st wrote:

Well I’m new to coding and just wanted something to build on. Most of what you are saying is foreign. I’m not going to give up because everyone has to start somewhere.

I can’t program Castle Wars when I have downloaded no sources or anything from Mopar to build on. I would love to do it myself.

Basically what I want is any server with graphics and interfaces older than 2010.

Not sure if that made sense, I’m tired.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for 2010-2012 AND Castle Wars
item.dc:creator: @A_Gh0st A Gh0st
item.description:
@A_Gh0st wrote:

I don’t want to host a server. I just want one that I can mess around on offline so I can learn how to code. My favorite thing is Castle Wars so yeah.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for 2010-2012 AND Castle Wars
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

Doesn’t matrix have that?

But if you end up using it don’t host it as a matrix leech; too many out there, useless, you won’t get any players.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for 2010-2012 AND Castle Wars
item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11
item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

[quote=“k1ng0frs, post:11, topic:466142”][quote author=heatrn11 link=topic=577216.msg4144664#msg4144664 date=1352148574]

Topics like this make me so fucking mad.

Learn some basic java yourself and create your own.

ugh this community.

You need more than just java to create a private server.

Don’t hate.

You can make a rsps with only java, you don’t need to use php or html except for maybe the webclient lol.

Incorrect, you can make a server with any programming language AFAIK

Facepalm I never said you can only make a rsps with java… I said [quote]
You can make a rsps with only java, [/quote]
[/quote]
not sure if I’m wrong or not[/quote]
Meaning any other language is not necessary.

Read full topic
